name: Anser serpulo
author: SarakaUnciv
description:
Add a lot of content.
	
	-Over simplified factories. and heaters.
	-Super Drill and pump.
	-Op conveyer, Overdrive x10 speed.
	-OP units and turret.
	
	You can watch mod sample on my Youtube. Link in Repo
	
	There are both Serpulo and Erekir version of this mod. make sure to download both mods
